sentence.Network_en: Overcooked greens are my most vivid recollection of school dinners.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我对学校午餐的回忆中，印象最深刻的就是蔬菜总是炒过头。

sentence.Network_en: He had no recollection of the crash.
sentence.Network_cn: 那次车祸他一点也不记得了。

sentence.Network_en: I have no recollection of meeting her before.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting gathering things together again): from French or medieval Latin recollectio(n-), from the verb recolligere 'gather again' (see recollect)

entry.def: If you have a recollection of something, you remember it.

example.ex: Pat has vivid recollections of the trip...
example.tran: 帕特清清楚楚地记得那次旅行。

example.ex: He had no recollection of the crash...
example.tran: 那次车祸他一点也不记得了。

means.word_mean: 1. the ability to recall past occurrences
2. the process of remembering (especially the process of recovering information by mental effort);

sentences.sentence: "he has total recall of the episode"

auth_sentence.content: Both these soldiers had no recollection of the events.

auth_sentence.content: My main recollection is wishing he would just shut up.

collect[v.收集]+ion表名词→n.收藏[品],收集[物]
collect[v.收集]+ive……的→adj.集体的,共同的 n.集体
elect[v.选举,推选;选择,作出选择]+ion表名词→n.选举,选择权;当选

stems_affixes.value_cn: [集合名词]精华;精锐;中坚分子;精英
stems_affixes.word_buile: el=elect[v.选举,推选;选择,作出选择]+ite人→选出的人→精英
intel=inter在……中间+lect选择,收集→在中间选出的人→智者
intellect[n.理智,智力,才智]+ual……的→n.知识分子 adj.智力的,理智的,有理解力的

acro高+lect讲,读,说→高层说的话
dia对着+lect讲,读,说→两个对着说→方言
idio个人的+lect说→个人说的话
neg没有+lect选择,收集→没有选出→疏忽
lect讲,读,说+ure表名词→n.&v.演讲,讲课
col共同+lect选择→放在一起选择→收集

se分开+lect选→选出分开

sentences.en: I have a dim recollection of it.
I have a vivid recollection of that old house.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地记得那所旧房子。

sentences.en: I have absolutely no recollection of the incident.
sentences.cn: 我对那件事一点儿也记不起来了。

sentences.en: I have a very sharp recollection of my last talk with him two years ago.
sentences.cn: 两年前我和他最后一次谈话的情景仍历历在目。

sentences.en: I have many pleasant recollections of the time we spent together.
sentences.cn: 我有很多有关我们一起度过的时光的美好回忆。
